name: dohdec-monorepo
description: DNS over HTTPS and DNS over TLS

scripts.release: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.preall:check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run all:types && npm run all:docs
scripts.version: ver=`npm pkg get version | sed -E 's/"*([^"]+)"*/\1/'` && npm pkg set -ws version=$ver && npm pkg set dependencies.dohdec=$ver --workspace dohdec-cli && git add pkg/*/package.json

author: Joe Hildebrand <joe-github@cursive.net>
